attributes.action: Do not close the gyms under the new lockdown measures
attributes.additional_details: The second biggest danger to individuals when it comes to covid other than age is obesity. Gyms have strict measures in place that adhere to the government guidelines, all equipment is clean and social distancing measures are put in place properly. Closing something that makes you healthy during a time when people need to be healthy just seems absolutely backwards, we should class gyms as essential, not just for physical health but the mental health of the people which is on a rapid decline.
attributes.background: Do not close the gyms under the new lockdown measures starting from November 5th.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
